item.title: 2025 Triumph Scrambler 400 X
item.description:

Displacement: 398.15 cc
Bore and Stroke: 89 x 64 mm
Compression Ratio: 12:1
Final Drive: X ring chain
Front Suspension: 43mm upside down Big Piston forks. 150mm wheel travel

Rear Tire: 140/80-17

Seat Height: 32.87 in.
Rake: 23.2 º
Fuel Capacity: 3.43 gal.
